div.div: Meals For Students During School Closures

div.p: The district will begin food service for all school age children who need it on Monday, March 16th at Evergreen Primary, Narrows View Intermediate, Chambers Primary and Unive...

div.p: The mission of University Place School District, in partnership with our community, is to ensure that all UPSD students are competent, contributing citizens.
